item.title: 日本债券市场风险在五年期债券销售前重回焦点
item.description: 日本将于周三拍卖五年期国债，而市场对该国债务市场流动性差和波动性的担忧再度升温。【原文：Japan will auction five-year government bonds Wednesday against the backdrop of renewed concerns over poor liquidity and volatility in the nation’s debt market.】

item.title: 小型车下滑，铃木印度分公司加倍努力发展 SUV
item.description: 印度顶级汽车制造商玛鲁蒂铃木（Maruti Suzuki India Ltd.）正努力应对其主打产品小型车需求的放缓，熟悉该计划的人士称，该公司将推出第二款中型车型，以扩大其 SUV 产品组合。【原文：Maruti Suzuki India Ltd. is set to expand its SUV portfolio with a second mid-sized model, people familiar with the plan said, as the nation’s top carmaker scrambles to counter slowing demand for its bread-and-butter small cars.】

item.title: 中国动力煤因供热中断创 5 个月新高
item.description: 由于矿区的暴雨中断了煤炭的产出，而城市的酷热又促进了对燃料的降温需求，中国的电厂煤炭价格已升至 3 月份以来的最高水平。【原文：Power plant coal prices in China have risen to the highest level since March, as downpours in mining areas disrupt output and scorching heat in cities boosts cooling demand for the fuel.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 SO4 公司从亿万富翁的湖滨路工地出口钾肥
item.description: 由捷克亿万富翁帕维尔-蒂卡克（Pavel Tykac）拥有的澳大利亚钾肥生产商 SO4 表示，该公司已向海外进行了首次商业装运，并计划成为主要的化肥出口商。【原文：SO4, the Australian potash producer owned by Czech billionaire Pavel Tykac, said it made its first commercial shipment overseas and plans to become a major exporter of the fertilizer.】

item.title: 亿万富翁郭台铭的 CDL 在争吵后利润增长乏力
item.description: 这家由新加坡最富有的家族控制的开发商今年上半年的利润略有增长，但这一时期却因一场破坏性的家族争斗而蒙上了阴影。【原文：The Singapore developer controlled by the city-state’s richest clan reported a small increase in profit in the first half of the year, a period overshadowed by a damaging family feud.】

item.title: 通胀数据助推美国降息预期，黄金保持小幅上涨
item.description: 在美国通胀数据符合预期并加强了对下月降息的赌注之后，黄金保持了小幅上涨。【原文：Gold held a modest gain following a US inflation reading that was in line with expectations and reinforced wagers on an interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 关注特朗普与普京乌克兰问题会晤，石油止跌回升
item.description: 石油在周二的清淡交易中下跌后持稳，投资者期待美国和俄罗斯领导人周五的会谈带来新的动力。【原文：Oil was steady after dropping in thin trading on Tuesday, with investors looking ahead to talks between the US and Russian leaders on Friday for fresh impetus.】

item.title: Man Group 旗下日本基金买入银行股押注通胀
item.description: 全球最大的上市对冲基金 Man Group 的一位投资经理正在将日本的金融股纳入她的投资组合，因为她认为日本央行需要加息来抑制通货膨胀。【原文：An investment manager at the world’s largest publicly traded hedge fund, Man Group, is adding Japan’s financial shares to her portfolio on the view the nation’s central bank will need to hike interest rates to tame inflation.】

item.title: 中国 11 万亿美元股票市场正在悄然复苏
item.description: 近几个月来，尽管缺乏重大催化剂，但中国股市仍有所上涨，国内充裕的流动性可能会维持股市的涨势。【原文：Chinese stocks have gained ground in recent months despite a lack of major catalysts, with ample domestic liquidity likely to sustain the rally.】

item.title: B.Riley 预计第二季度净收入将有所改善
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc. 估计该公司第二季度将扭亏为盈，因为该公司将继续努力遏制因投资恶化而造成的财务压力。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. estimated it swung to a profit in the second quarter, as the firm continues its efforts to curb the financial strain caused by soured investments.】

item.title: 黄金大涨，进化矿业公司利润翻了一番多
item.description: Evolution Mining Ltd. 的全年利润翻了一番多，创下历史新高，贵金属价格的飙升推动了这家澳大利亚第二大黄金开采商的发展。【原文：Evolution Mining Ltd.’s full-year profit more than doubled to a record, with Australia’s second-biggest gold miner boosted by a surge in prices of the precious metal.】

item.title: 人工智能在研究中削弱了医生在数月内发现癌症的能力
item.description: 在一项新的研究中，被誉为有望改变医学的人工智能导致一些医生在短短几个月后就丧失了技能。【原文：Artificial intelligence, touted for its potential to transform medicine, led to some doctors losing skills after just a few months in a new study.】

item.title: 美国 CPI 助推美联储减息预期，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在美国通胀数据与预期相符，令市场猜测美联储将在 9 月份有降息空间之后，亚洲股市将追随华尔街走高。【原文：Stocks in Asia were set to track Wall Street higher after an in-line US inflation reading bolstered speculation the Federal Reserve will have room to cut rates in September.】

item.title: 腾讯投资者关注廉价股票估值创新高之路
item.description: 随着全球科技巨头股价屡创新高，投资者看到了腾讯控股有限公司股价最终重现昔日辉煌的机会。【原文：As tech megacaps around the world climb to new records, investors see a chance for Tencent Holdings Ltd. shares to finally regain their former glory.】

item.title: 泰国将在新领导上任前的最后一次会议上降低利率
item.description: 泰国央行预计将在即将卸任的行长塞萨布-素提瓦特那鲁普（Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput）领导的最后一次会议上下调关键利率，因为决策者希望保护经济免受美国关税和通货紧缩风险的影响。【原文：The Bank of Thailand is expected to cut its key rate at the last meeting to be led by outgoing Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput, as policymakers look to shield the economy from the risks of US tariffs and deflation.】

item.title: 法拉贝拉第二季度利润因零售业务强劲而增长
item.description: Falabella SA 公司第二季度的利润增幅超过预期，原因是智利整个经济的零售销售依然强劲，尽管其他指标显示经济扩张更加低迷。【原文：Falabella SA’s second-quarter profit rose more than expected as retail sales across the economy in Chile remain robust, even as other indicators show more subdued expansion.】

item.title: 公司和持有人发售股票后 Circle 下跌
item.description: Circle Internet Group Inc.股价下跌，此前这家第二大稳定币发行商和包括联合创始人兼首席执行官杰里米-阿莱尔（Jeremy Allaire）在内的一批股东宣布发售合计1000万股股票。【原文：Shares of Circle Internet Group Inc. fell after the second-largest stablecoin issuer and a group of shareholders including co-founder and Chief Executive Officer Jeremy Allaire announced an offering to sell 10 million shares combined.】

item.title: 戈卢布牵头为害虫控制公司 Greenix 提供 3 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Golub Capital 主导了一笔约 3 亿美元的私人信用贷款，以支持私募股权公司 Gridiron Capital 收购害虫控制公司 Greenix。【原文：Golub Capital led a private credit loan of around $300 million to support private equity firm Gridiron Capital’s purchase of pest control company Greenix, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Bullish 的首次公开募股只是真正战斗的开始
item.description: Olga Kharif 写道，早期对一个品牌或项目的投入并不能保证未来的回报，尤其是在加密货币领域。【原文：Olga Kharif writes about how early devotion to a brand or project doesn’t guarantee future rewards, especially in crypto.】

item.title: 香港的 "中国制造 "交易盛宴面临美国反弹的风险
item.description:
中国已经将这座城市变成了内地企业急于向海外扩张的融资引擎。【原文：

China has turned the city into a funding engine for mainland firms rushing to expand overseas. 

】

item.title: 数据中心需求激增，CoreWeave 亏损扩大
item.description: CoreWeave Inc. 在继续建设以满足人工智能开发者需求的同时，出现了更大的亏损。该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌了 5%。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. posted steeper losses as it continued to build to meet demand from artificial intelligence developers. The company’s shares fell 5% in after-hours trading.】

item.title: <strong>中国如何让香港 IPO 市场恢复活力</strong
item.description:
在今天的 "Big Take Asia "播客中，中国如何将香港变为急于向海外扩张的内地企业的融资引擎。【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast, how China turned Hong Kong into a funding engine for mainland firms rushing to expand overseas.

】

item.title: 通胀数据支持鸽派，美联储大幅减息的赌注升温
item.description: 一份基本良好的美国通胀报告为押注美联储将很快降息的交易商提供了支持，一些交易商认为大幅降息的可能性增大。【原文：A largely benign US inflation report is bolstering the case for traders betting that the Federal Reserve will soon cut interest rates, with some seeing an increased possibility of an outsize reduction.】

item.title: Bloom Energy 预计将与数据中心达成更多供电协议
item.description: Bloom Energy Corp. 首席执行官 KR Sridhar 表示，在达成为甲骨文公司人工智能设施提供电力的协议后，该公司正在与其他大型数据中心开发商进行谈判。【原文：Bloom Energy Corp.’s Chief Executive Officer KR Sridhar said the company is in talks with other major data-center developers following a deal to provide power to Oracle’s AI facilities.】

item.title: Cava 下调销售额预期，原因是用餐者态度谨慎，酒吧业务高速增长
item.description: 卡瓦集团公司（Cava Group Inc.）在第二季度销售额大幅下滑后下调了全年销售额展望，原因是食客们在餐厅用餐上的消费减少，这表明该品牌在保持近年来的快速增长方面正面临着压力。【原文：Cava Group Inc. trimmed its annual sales outlook after a sharp deceleration in the second quarter as skittish diners spent less on restaurant meals, showing the pressure the brand is facing to keep up with its speedy growth in recent years.】

item.title: 杜邦剥离的 Qnity 公司以 41 亿美元的债务作为偿付价格
item.description: 杜邦公司（DuPont de Nemours Inc.）的电子业务将分拆为 Qnity Electronics Inc.【原文：DuPont de Nemours Inc.’s electronics business, which will be spun off into the Qnity Electronics Inc. brand, priced a $4.1 billion debt offering to fund a payout to DuPont in connection with the reorganization.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉拒绝埃克森公司在争议地区开展业务
item.description: 委内瑞拉外交部表示，它已向圭亚那发出口头通知，拒绝埃克森公司的 "一个圭亚那 "浮式生产储油轮开始运营。【原文：Venezuela’s Foreign Ministry said it presented a verbal notice to Guyana rejecting the start of operations of Exxon’s ‘One Guyana’ FPSO.】

item.title: BKV 首席执行官预计 2026 年液化天然气项目的启动将提升天然气价格
item.description: 德克萨斯州巴尼特页岩盆地最大的天然气生产商 BKV 公司预计，随着液化天然气出口终端的投产，2026 年的天然气需求将十分强劲，从而推动燃料价格上涨。【原文：BKV Corp., the largest natural gas producer in Texas’ Barnett shale basin, expects strong gas demand in 2026 as liquefied natural gas export terminals come online, driving up prices for the fuel.】

item.title: 加密货币影响者 Pompliano 购入股票，Opendoor 反弹
item.description: 在加密货币投资者、极具影响力的时事通讯作者和播客安东尼-庞皮里亚诺（Anthony Pompliano）表示已买入这家数字房地产公司的股票后，Opendoor Technologies Inc.【原文：Opendoor Technologies Inc. has resumed its surge after cryptocurrency investor and influential newsletter writer and podcaster Anthony Pompliano said he’d bought shares in the digital real estate firm.】

item.title: 夏季杠杆贷款利润率降至垃圾底线水平
item.description: 这就是 175 年的夏天。【原文：Call it the summer of 175.】
